argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ply1lpir.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_fldidom | |- ( R e. Field -> R e. IDomn ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_ply1idom | |- ( R e. IDomn -> P e. IDomn ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. Field -> P e. IDomn ) |
| 5 |  | #P_isfld | |- ( R e. Field <-> ( R e. DivRing /\ R e. CRing ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simplbi | |- ( R e. Field -> R e. DivRing ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_ply1lpir | |- ( R e. DivRing -> P e. LPIR ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. Field -> P e. LPIR ) |
| 9 |  | #P_df-pid | |- PID = ( IDomn i^i LPIR ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_elin2 | |- ( P e. PID <-> ( P e. IDomn /\ P e. LPIR ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 8, 10 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( R e. Field -> P e. PID ) |
